name: Trail-Passion
author: Tolokoban

sections.description:
Trail-Passion is a web site dedicated to outdoor sports. It provides easy ways to show GPS tracks on flat maps, elevation graphs and event 3D views.
If you want to show your last hicking or race in your blog, this plug-in is made for you.

Not only can you add maps on wordpress, but also put markers on your maps based on the GeoMashup localization of your posts and medias.
sections.installation: Just unzip the file trail-passion.zip in your /wp-content/plugins directory and activate it through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Do I need to get an account on trail-passion’s website to use this plugin?

No. You can display all the public traces of the trail-passion’s website without registration.
Registration is only needed if you want to store maps of your own.

Did you provide an application to easily track routes with GPS on smartphone?

Yes! We provide an Android App for this.

short_description: Add 2d and 3d maps into your posts. And place posts and medias onto the maps.

screenshots.caption: New button for Rich Text Editor.
Fast seach in the trail-passion's database.
Search can be made by user or by trace's name.
Provide a size for the resulting IFrame.
4 types of view : an interactive 2d map, an elevation graph, 3d view with fly mode, live GPS tracking.
